Item 2.02 - Results of Operations and Fi.content: On January 27, 2021, Apple Inc. (“Apple”) issued a press release regarding Apple’s financial results for its first fiscal quarter ended December 26, 2020. A copy of Apple’s press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1.

subsections.filing_status: The information contained in this Current Report shall not be deemed “filed” for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the “Exchange Act”), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing.

subsections.exhibit_list: Exhibit 99.1: Press release issued by Apple Inc. on January 27, 2021. Exhibit 104: Inline XBRL for the cover page of this Current Report on Form 8-K.
